title: The test issue-863 fails sometimes
body:
<!--
  Please follow the template.  If you don't, your issue may be closed.

  Have a question?  This is the TypeORM issue tracker - and not the right place
  for general support or questions.  Instead, check the "Support" Documentation
  on the best places to ask questions!

  https://github.com/typeorm/typeorm/blob/master/docs/support.md
-->

## Issue Description
Test `issue-863.ts` fails sometimes, even if the PR doesn't change anything related to it
This is most easily noticeable in [this PR](https://github.com/typeorm/typeorm/pull/8550), which only fixes a typo in the docs, but still failed a test for:
```
github issues > #863 indices > create schema
       "before all" hook in "github issues > #863 indices > create schema":
     AlreadyHasActiveConnectionError: Cannot create a new connection named "sqlite", because connection with such name already exist and it now has an active connection session.
```
### Expected Behavior
Existing tests should always pass


### Actual Behavior
Test `issue-863.ts` fails sometimes

### Are you willing to resolve this issue by submitting a Pull Request?

<!-- Put "‚úÖ" (:white_check_mark:) to one of these options, left "‚úñÔ∏è" (:heavy_multiplication_x:) others: -->

 - ‚úñÔ∏è Yes, I have the time, and I know how to start.
 - ‚úÖ Yes, I have the time, but I don't know how to start. I would need guidance.
 - ‚úñÔ∏è No, I don‚Äôt have the time, but I can support (using donations) development.
 - ‚úñÔ∏è No, I don‚Äôt have the time and I‚Äôm okay to wait for the community / maintainers to resolve this issue.
